title: Check Palindrome
description:
Check if a string is a palindrome.

Implement an efficient solution.

visibleTestCases.explanation: reads the same forwards and backwards

hiddenTestCases.input: "A man a plan a canal Panama"

hints: Use two pointers from both ends.

title: Count Characters
description:
Count the number of characters in a string.

Implement an efficient solution.

title: Count Vowels
description:
Count the number of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in a string.

Ignore case.
hints: Check if the character is a vowel (case-insensitive).

title: Find the Index of the First Occurrence in a String
description: Given two strings haystack and needle, return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack. If needle is an empty string, return 0 (consistent with C's strstr() and Java's indexOf()).

visibleTestCases.explanation: The substring "ll" first occurs starting at index 2.

hints: Consider KMP algorithm for optimal solution.

title: First Non-Repeating Character
description:
Find the first non-repeating character in a string.

Return the character itself. If none exists, return a space (' ').

visibleTestCases.explanation: l is the first non-repeating character

hints: Use a hash map to count character frequencies.
Make two passes: one to count, one to find first unique.

title: Reverse a String
description:
Given a string, return its reverse.

Implement an efficient solution.

visibleTestCases.explanation: Palindrome remains the same when reversed

hints: Alternatively, use two pointers from both ends.
